long_description: Panther Martin Regulars are our most popular sonic spinners. The extraordinary fish catching ability of these lures have been proven time after time over the 50 years we have been selling them. Each and every year fisherman report catch after catch with Panther Martin Regulars. They are killer lures for all kinds of fresh water fish.
google_categorization: Sporting Goods > Outdoor Recreation > Fishing > Fishing Lures
